definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: They requested sappers to mend bridges or remove mines.
sentences.chinese: 他們要求坑道工兵修橋或拆雷。

sentences.english: Micro-channels filled with different materials in order to increase the speed and feeling.
sentences.chinese: 微坑道填充不同的材料以提高速度和手感。

sentences.english: The stability of underground gallery ordinarily distinguished by periphery displacement.
sentences.chinese: 地下坑道的穩定性一般以坑道周邊位移來判別。

sentences.english: The stability of underground gallery ordinarily distinguished by periphery displacement.
sentences.chinese: 地下坑道的穩定性一般以坑道周邊位移來判別。

sentences.english: The pillars sustain the roof of the pit.
They have had the tunnel shored up with concrete.
sentences.chinese: 他們已經叫人用水泥把坑道加固。

sentences.english: The resistivity sounding data can be obtained on four corners and four surfaces in tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 電阻率測深數據可利用坑道的四個面和四個角得到。

sentences.english: The pillars sustain the roof of the pit.
The trees are on the roof. You can see roots hanging down.
sentences.chinese: 數木都生長在坑道頂部，你能夠看到那些下垂的樹根。

sentences.english: Parties of soldiers mined the walls of the castle.
sentences.chinese: 幾隊士兵在城堡的牆下挖坑道。

sentences.english: His Troglodyte hordes are feared the world over, especially in the dark tunnels of Nighon.
sentences.chinese: 他的洞穴人軍隊在尼根黑暗的坑道中百戰百勝。

sentences.english: And the diggings have gone so far that a few strokes of the pick would bring you out to it.
sentences.chinese: 坑道已經挖得很遠，只要再挖幾鍬就可以到外面去了。

definition: defensive structure/military fortifications/(Tw) construction works/civil engineering works
pillbox (military fortification)/blockhouse/euphemistic way of writing 屌爆[diao3 bao4]
vertical shaft (for mining, ventilation systems etc)
Dongkou county in Shaoyang 邵陽|邵阳[Shao4 yang2], Hunan
